trans-unit.source: In addition to automatically connecting clients to the primary replica, a listener can also be used to redirect read-only workloads to the secondaries.
trans-unit.target: In addition to automatically connecting clients to the primary replica, a listener can also be used to redirect read-only workloads to the secondaries.

trans-unit.source: This can improve the performance and scalability of your overall solution.
trans-unit.target: This can improve the performance and scalability of your overall solution.

trans-unit.source: [Use ReadIntent Routing with Azure AlwaysOn Availability Group Listener](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=522515).
trans-unit.target: [Use ReadIntent Routing with Azure AlwaysOn Availability Group Listener](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=522515).

trans-unit.source: For other information about using SQL Server in Azure, see [SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines](../articles/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-sql-server-infrastructure-services.md).
trans-unit.target: For other information about using SQL Server in Azure, see [SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines](../articles/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-sql-server-infrastructure-services.md).
